title: Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link
description: Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link
OB: When using build 20021001 and removing the welcome line in prefstore.ini of the workbench metadata, I expect to get a welcome page when restarting. Upon clicking on any link in the welcome page, the appropriate action is executed. However, when returning to the welcome page, the clicked link is not selected. Currently, only the ProductInfoDialog dialog selects links when clicked.
EB: When using build 20021001 and removing the welcome line in prefstore.ini of the workbench metadata, I expect to get a welcome page when restarting. Upon clicking on any link in the welcome page, the appropriate action should execute, and the clicked link should be selected when the user returns to the welcome page. This will provide more context to the user.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Use build 20021001 and remove the welcome line in prefstore.ini of the workbench metadata.
2. Restart the application and ensure that you get a welcome page.
3. Click on any link in the welcome page.
4. Confirm that the appropriate action is executed.
5. Return to the welcome page.
6. Observe that the clicked link is not selected.
